Articles.Content: I play on a stand alone computer NOT on the internet. My question is simply since the pc I use isn't on the internet, so it's impossible to send error reports and as the game crashes so much, is there a way to stop it taking 20 minutes to generate error reports. No point in the game generating them since they can't be sent.

Hello brjanowich, sorry but this cannot be disabled.

But if you upload your KSP output_log.txt and dxdiag report we may be able to help you.

I am not having a specifi problem. Just normal hic-cups that are to be expexted with a such a complex, unique, awsome game. It's just when I have a hic-cup it takes about 15 minutes for the report to genetate and release the game to reload it, since the computer I use it on is standalone, no point in waiting for a report to generate that can't be sent. No biggie. Awsome game. I play .23 something as I have not updated in a long time. Congrats on all your hard work, thought and time you put into ksp. Best realistic space sim out there. Keep up the good work.
Yeah it should never take that long, it shouldn't even take more than a second to write the crash log, so something must be wrong.
